Events that occurred on 13 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1867 - Professor William Craigie is born.
1917 â€“ J.R.R. Tolkien is admitted to Brooklands Officers' Hospital in Hull for the first time.
1976 - Mythcon 7 in Sacramento, California.
1978 - Mythcon 9 in West Sacramento, California.
1982 - Mythcon 13 at Chapman College in Orange, California.
1983 - Mythcon 14 at Scripps College in Claremont, California.
1984 - Mythcon 15 at Mills College in Oakland, California.
2002 - The Battlelore album ...Where the Shadows Lie is released.
2005 - The Tolkien Society's Tolkien 2005 conference in Birmingham, England.
2010 - "Edge of the Wild", Tolkien art exhibition in Moreton-in-Marsh, England.
2010 - Fantasy, Myth and the Measure of Truth is released in paperback.
2011 - Omentielva Cantea - 4th International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages in Valencia, Spain.
2017 - Omentielva Otsea - the Seventh International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages at California State University, East Bay.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
